Well I thought about this many times but things are complicated. 
First the=
 quality of education in Bulgaria is poor compared to the 
U.S., Canada and=
 most countries in western Europe. Ph.D. students 
here learn about backpro=
p at school. Too old stuff. I wonder do these 
people have ever heard of NE=
AT, HyperNEAT, Novelty Search.. Second, 
going abroad to study is difficult=
 in my case because someone has to 
pay for it :)
I prefer doing my own res=
earch without going to graduate school. I 
have all the things necessary - =
a computer, information and 
imagination. Getting credited for doing someth=
ing cool and/or 
contributing to some research is just enough for me. 
But =
I don't know, maybe some day.. 

P.S. I am glad that you like my demos, the=
re are more coming.. :)  

Peter
